name: Super User
description:
In Super User you play as Wes DeSouza, a guy looking for a game to play. He finds RPG Quest Online and meets another player named Jason. Jason and Wes join forces to become the best players in the game.

Super User uses an elemental weapon system where certain elements are better or worse against others. Enemies share this feature, so certain weapons are better for fighting certain enemies.

Free download here: http://www.mediafire.com/download/mbnoabmazeagfsu/Super_User.zip
